text.title: Mathemalogium prime partis Andree alexandri Ratisbonensis mathematici super novam et veterem loycam Aristotelis. Hermannus Buschius pasiphilus lectori. Epigrama extemporale

bibliography.title: Mathemalogium prime partis Andree alexandri Ratisbonensis mathematici super novam et veterem loycam Aristotelis. Hermannus Buschius pasiphilus lectori. Epigrama extemporale
bibliography.note: Statement of Responsibility: Andree alexandri Ratisbone[n]sis mathematici super novam et veterem loycam Aristotelis. Hermannus Buschius pasiphilus lectori. Epigrama extemporale.
Publication Statement: Melchior Lotter Liptzen imp[re]ssor solertissim[us] impressit anno salutis Millesimo quingentesimoquarto. Nonis Marci.

Provenance: Autograph, head of title-page: Joannes Deeus 1551 Londini [John Dee]MS. note by Dee, last p. under colophon: 'Perlegi anno 1555 inter 18 et 24 septebris fullhamiae in aedibus singularis amici meu Rever[en]di ... Edmu[n]di Bonar Londinesis episcopi.' [Edmund Bonner]Former shelfmark on fly-leaf and title-page: V221Copy 7997: Roberts and Watson note that 'it is signed "Joannes Deeus 1551 Londini", and has numerous marginal notes and underlinings...it probably passed into the Dorchester Library independently of Nicholas Saunder'.
Imprint information from colophon.Blind impressions of one line of type on sig. A[1]r and A3r.Copy 7997: Dorchester No. D14/1
